lead_paragraph: After 34 podiums from 106 starts Dani Sordo finally took the step which had evaded him for so long when he clinched a first ever victory in the Rally of Germany on Sunday.

headline.main: Sordo Captures First Ever Win at Rally of Germany
headline.print_headline: Sordo Captures First Ever Win at Rally of Germany
